properties.name: PDFReference
properties.label: PDF Source Property
properties.description: Select the property holding the PDF URL or Base64 string.

properties.name: HighlightData
properties.label: Highlight Data Property
properties.description: Select the Page List property holding the highlight coordinates and metadata (e.g., .HighlightData).

properties.name: OnSelectProperty
properties.label: Property to Update on Click
properties.description: Select the property to populate with the FieldID when a highlight is clicked (e.g., .SelectedFieldID).

properties.name: height
properties.label: Viewer Height
properties.description: Specify the height of the PDF viewer (e.g., 750px or 80vh).
